title: $1,525 - NEWLY REMODELED 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom LUXURY House In Port Ric
description:
Home: This home is absolutely stunning and has been recently remodeled. Come inside to your new living & dining room with all new walls and plank flooring. Recessed lighting with dimmers can be found throughout first floor. Look up and notice the coffer ceilings that are truly breath taking for this home. Off of the dining room is the new modern kitchen with new stainless appliances, cabinets, and counter tops. The first floor is complete with a laundry area and full bathroom. First floor bathroom features tiled shower stall and new vanity. Open the back door and you will be delighted to have a nice size backyard with new turf and privacy wood fence. The second level features 2 bedrooms which are both generously sized. Bedrooms feature ceiling fans, smart ac units, and brand new carpet. Basement has a full bathroom and new carpet. Great storage space. Fresh new modern gray paint covers the whole home. Home has updated double pane windows and individual heating and cooling zones to help save on bills! Home is located on a double wide street for easy parking! (this is a rare amenity) Don’t settle for a bland rental home without character or charm! Home is located on a wide street!
LOCATION: 15 minutes to center city, 5 minutes to I-95, 5 minute walk to restaurants on Somerset St. (Tacconelli’s Pizza, Somerset Splits, Kitty’s Luncheonette, Hinge Cafe). Easy access to Fishtown without paying a huge rental premium. Green space lovers can relax at Power’s Park which is right next door. Mainstream shopping is at your fingertips on Aramingo Avenue. 2.5 Miles from Temple University!
DETAILS: $1525/month. 1 year lease. Total required to move in: (Total: $4575). Tenant pays gas, electric, and water/sewer. $57 screening fee (background check/credit check) per adult. Strong stable income AND financial standing REQUIRED. Must make minimum of $4500 after taxes per month to qualify. Proof of income required. No prior judgments or evictions in last 4 years. Renter’s insurance required. NO SMOKING OR VAPING! All applicants are screened thoroughly. Please do not disturb current resident.
PET POLICY: small dogs (under 25 lbs.) or cats allowed on case by case basis. Pet must be spayed/neutered. All vaccines must be up to date. $40 pet fee/month
Contact: For quickest response please text by clicking on contact info.

title: 115 FERNON ST PHILADELPHIA, PA 19148-home for rent.
description: Welcome to 115 Fernon St! This gorgeous 3 bedroom / 1.5 bathroom single family home features hardwood floors, gas fireplace, in-unit laundry, and large backyard. An entryway vestibule welcomes you into the living area boasting 2 large windows at the front and a gas fireplace with charming mantle. There's a tiled powder room off of the living room to ensure that entertaining is a breeze! Your dining area is sizable with a ceiling fan for added comfort. Kitchen features include a built-in island, recessed lighting, tons of cabinetry and prep space, and stainless steel appliances including gas oven / stove, microwave, and dishwasher, and white double door fridge. From the kitchen you can access your giant back patio with ample room for patio furniture and a bbq grill. Continue upstairs with your 3 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom. The front bedroom has 2 front windows, large closet space, and ceiling fan. Your middle room has 1 window and small closet space. The tiled bathroom is to the back with shower /  combo. Your third bedroom is also to the back with large closet, built in shelves and ceiling fan. Downstairs is your finished basement with in-unit washer / dryer and plenty of room for storage. Schedule your showing today! About The Neighborhood: Located in Pennsport, right off of I-95 for a quick & easy commute. You'll be walking distance to Dickinson Square Park, Edward O'Malley Sports Complex, Karen Donnelly Park, and Herron Playground. Close proximity to ample shopping centers for groceries and errands. Hotspots in the area include Moonshine Philly, Creme Brulee, Grindcore House, 2street, Herman's Coffee, The Dutchess, Gooey Looies, and more! Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Pets are conditional on owner's approval and may require an additional fee and/or monthly pet rent, if accepted. (Generally, $500/dog and $250/cat, and/or monthly pet rent). Tenants responsible for: electricity, gas, cable/internet, and water. Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, no landlord filings or evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history.

title: 2838 Newberry Rd, Philadelphia, PA 19154-home for rent.
description: Welcome to 2838 Newberry Rd! This wonderful Single Home is located in the Normandy neighborhood section. Step inside to a gorgeous completely open concept space. The living room features lots of windows for tons of light and fresh air. The large bow window that faces the front was just installed last year. There is a gas fireplace as the focal point of the living room along with some custom built in shelves. Then just across the other end is the kitchen. There you will find a bar style counter so friends can sit and gather. The kitchen sink and workspace faces the living room as well which creates just an awesome entertaining space. The kitchen features a small island which is extra small for the chef to prepare food. Plus is has its own outlet too! There is plenty of cabinet and counter space for all you will need. A wine/beer fridge and nice appliances. Now, if you were still hoping for a dining room, don't worry, there is one. There is a large formal dining room that can fit a large dining table. This is wonderful for all your holiday gatherings. The first floor continues down the hall. You'll find a custom built very large full bathroom with an exquisite shower. The shower features are a large bench and rain shower. Wow! Then going further down the hall you will find the first bedroom. This a great standard size bedroom complete with a window, ceiling fan, and closet space. To the 2nd floor, at the top of the stairs you will find the 2nd bedroom. A great size bedroom with ceiling fan and closet space. At the end of the hall, open the pocket door to find the laundry room. This is a perfect space for all you need conveniently located on the 2nd floor. Then there is a great open space area that could be used for many things. Then we go into the main bedroom. An excellent space with lots of closet space, ceiling fan, and the En Suite bathroom. This bathroom is a large full size bathroom. It features a large vanity with drawers, a large mirror, a full size tub/shower, and nice modern tile. Outdoor space? Yes! From the dining room, you can exit through the double doors to the large deck area. The deck features a screened in Gazebo that is included! Besides the Gazebo, there is still more deck space for anything else you need. Lots of grass yard space. An attached shed. Lots of room to enjoy and to entertain your guests. Superb location! Easy and fast to the Boulevard, to Woodhaven Rd, to I-95, and to NJ. Just a a few minutes away from the City Limits. Want to have a catch? Practice your soccer? Not a problem! You can take a very short walk to one of the many surrounding fields. There's a walking/running path on the other side of Comly Rd that goes around the Northeast Airport.

description:
The studio apartment home at 2111 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. This home on the 21st floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as October 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at Sue's Produce Market, the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, and Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Restaurant Aleksandar, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, and The Dandelion. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, K'Far, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, Ultimo, Vibrant, Elixr, Alchemy, Nook Bakery & Coffee Bar, Konditori, and Di Bruno Bros.. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab a babka or sticky bun from The Bakeshop on 20th. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Shop at the fabulous farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Recently Renovated 1 Bed w/ High Ceilings - Amazing Central Location
description:
Countermanagement.com/keppoch-house
Don't miss the opportunity to live in the beautifully renovated Keppoch House Apartments, situated on the historic tree-lined 13th Street corridor in Philadelphia. Bike lanes connect the Bella Vista and Washington Square neighborhoods and run parallel to the Avenue of the Arts for easy access throughout the city. You'll be within walking distance in every direction of Center City's best bars, restaurants, boutiques, culture, performance and visual arts venues. The amenities in the building include an elevator, free gym access, a shared roof deck, and limited garage parking availability.
Located in the heart of Washington Square West, you are encouraged to shop local! You 'll be within walking distance to Vetri Cucina, Mixto Restaurante, Sumo Sushi, Chapterhouse Cafe & Gallery, The Cambridge, Cheu Noodle Bar and more! You'll also have CVS, ACME Market, Whole Foods Market, and Unite Fitness all within a 1 mile radius.
Built in early 1900s and renovated in 2005, 2017, and 2019 the luxurious units offer modern industrial layouts in one of Philadelphia’s most historic neighborhoods. Situated on the tree-lined 13th Street corridor, residents enjoy open floor-plans in three unique styles, with elegant finishes and outdoor space, all within walking distance of the excitement and conveniences of downtown Philadelphia.
Keppoch House offers studio, 1 bedroom, and 2 bedroom apartments with state of the art keyless entry, covered private parking, NEST thermostats, energy-efficient appliances, onsite gym, new modern lobby, and rooftop deck with spectacular 360° views of the city. Enjoy modern living in one of Philadelphia’s classic historic districts.

title: Newly Renovated 2 bed/2 Bath Townhome in Brewerytown
description:
See listing for more details: https://www.compass.com/listing/1413-north-corlies-street-philadelphia-pa-19121/1149222957831515137/
Nestled on a quiet block in booming Brewerytown, this charming row home has blended contemporary features with character and charm. A large covered front porch is the welcoming invitation to the interior cozy open floor plan. Three large bay windows bring lots of natural light into the living and dining areas. A bright white kitchen includes modern stainless steel appliances and granite counters and leads out to a spacious back patio, ideal for seasonal grilling and entertaining. The second level features a roomy bedroom overlooking the patio. A full bath complete with a tub shower combo, single sink vanity and stackable washer/dryer sit the adjoining hallway. A spacious primary bedroom with three bay windows and a large double closet sit at the front of the house. A second full bath with a modern shower and vanity sit in the adjacent hallway across from a large linen closet. The large unfinished basement is ideal for extra storage.
Brewerytown corridor is a flux of activity these days. Home to brewpubs like Crime & Punishment, 2632 Brew, and Stones Brew there is also a diverse mix of gourmet burgers, Italian, Jamaican, pizza, soul food, and, of course, Chinese takeout.
Brewerytown Garden provides options for folks who would like to try their hand at urban farming.
Aldi market is close by as well as smaller local venues such as Primal Supply, Bravo Mini Market, Cecil B. Moore Grocery and Jefferson Food Market.
Public transportation routes include Septa Trolley Route 15 on Girard Avenue and Septa Bus Routes: 3, on Cecil B. Moore Ave.; 7, on 27th and 29th streets; 32, on 26th, 27th, 33rd and Poplar streets and Poplar Drive; 48, on 27th, Poplar and 29th streets; 49, on 29th Street

title: Truly unique, stunning Fishtown townhouse w/ PARKING for lease!
description:
Truly unique, stunning Fishtown townhouse w/ PARKING for lease! The first level of the home is the garage that spans the length of the home followed by the rear yard that can be used for gardening, relaxing and entertaining. Up the stairs you have the main level of the home that is completely open with massively tall ceilings and incredible natural light. The tiered level has the living and dining space on the lower level and full kitchen with eat in nook on the upper level. The kitchen has been recently remodeled with new countertops and fixtures. The top level features three bedrooms, stackable laundry closet, hall bathroom and a brand new primary bathroom. The primary bathroom is jawdropping with accented barn door, wall to wall mirrors, gorgeous tiling, waterfall shower and free standing tub. Through the primary bedroom is access to the green roof deck. The roof deck is lined with succulents to make it a true "green" roof, has panoramic views of the city, and tons of space for get togethers. Lastly, but perhaps the biggest selling point is the prime location in fishtown right off of Frankford ave and next to Palmer park. The home is just steps away from some of the best dining/restaurants in the city such as Suraya, Wm Mulherin's & sons, Pizzeria Beddia and La Colombe. This is a rare rental in a perfect location. **Owner would like to keep the back parking spot for his wood work space but could be leased for an additional $200 per month. Home can be rented furnished for an additional $200 per month.
401 Memphis St

Flowing off the living room of this expanded trinity, the full eat in kitchen is contemporarily designed with a subway tiled back splash, granite countertops, a brightly lit skylight shining down from the second floor, and a unique cut out above the sink allowing for the open flow feel of this wonderful living space. The second floor features the first of two bedrooms continuing with the hardwood flow throughout, your full bathroom bright with light from your second skylight, and the perfect hallway nook accented by that same skylight that shines all the way down to the kitchen. The master bedroom on the third floor features the second fireplace as well as a lighter hard wood finish that seems to draw in all of the natural light. This along with the high slanting ceiling give this room a very open airy feel making it a truly "feel good" space. Off of the master you will find the crown of this jewel of a home in a roof deck perfect for relaxing and enjoying all of the wonderful changing seasons our city has to offer. Take advantage of this amazing opportunity to be a part of a community that truly cares for each other in a home that will truly care for you.
725-727 Pemberton St #6

title: 2 Bedroom + Artists loft
description:
Old City
2BR / 1Ba + Artist's Loft
Available immediately
This modern 2 bedroom, was completely renovated in 2018. In addition to the 2 bedrooms there is an artists loft.
You can use it as office space and it has a great view, as seen from the very 1st photo.  Additionally, there is a lot of storage space in the back of the loft. Everything is in great condition! Theres a lot of sunlight coming into the living room from the double glass sliding doors and accent window atop the 16 foot cathedral ceiling. Hardwood floors throughout the apartment.  The kitchen boasts granite counter-tops, tiled back splash, large sink with garbage disposal, brand new dishwasher and gas stove (both stainless steel).  there's plenty of cabinetry and a stainless steel refrigerator.  The bathroom is large and  features tiled floors and shower along with plenty of shelving and storage space. It's tiled and there is plenty of storage space.  The bedrooms have remote controlled, ceiling fans, LED lighting and large lighted closets with storage space inside and above. lighted  central heat (gas) and air conditioning, full size washer and dryer, lighted closets and plenty of storage space. This apartment is one of 3 in the building and its second floor location allows for great views of the Ben Franklin Bridge and the Delaware River. Its located on the fringe of Olde City and Northern Liberties in a very quaint, niche neighborhood called “The Water’s Edge”. There is plenty of free street parking.  It's across the street from Morgans Pier, Race St. Pier, 2 dog parks, a people park and the Ben Franklin bridge. Just a short walk to the heart of Olde City and Northern Liberties. Only 2 blocks to the Spring Garden El station. 95N. on-ramp. A fantastic location!

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with City View on Rittenhouse Square
description:
The studio apartment home at 1006 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 10th floor features large windows that face north and have a city view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as December 7, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, Marine Layer, Tselaine, Bella Turka, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Bottega Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, The Continental Mid-town, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Elixr, Bluestone Lane, Konditori, Di Bruno Bros., Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Le Pain Quotidien. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

description:

This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 3rd floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Sue's Produce Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, or Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, Marine Layer, CB2, Tselaine, Angela Monaco Jewelry, Ritual Shoppe, Rebel, Je Suis Jolie, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, H&M, and Nordstrom Rack. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Spa Nail Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. description:
Freshly updated and back on the market! Don't miss your opportunity to call this apartment "home". A delightful old-fashioned front porch welcomes you to this smartly updated vintage Victorian charmer. Set on a quiet, tree-lined property with private garden spots available, this sunny end-unit apartment boasts many desirable features, including large windows, gas heat, central air, a breakfast room with new windows, ceiling fans and energy star rated appliances and hot water heater. Vintage Victorian touches like painted antique brick walls, original dark oak floors, a claw foot tub, crown moldings and original built-ins round out the old-world charm of this apartment, making it a one of a kind home that won't last! Hatfield has many leafy park trails, lively community events, fantastic splash park and pool, and three off-leash dog parks to take advantage of year-round, and is topped off with an award-winning school district. This is a small town with a big heart and a great place to call home. Also includes a NEW washer and dryer and a NEW efficient heating system.

title: Great 2 bedroom/2 bathroom rental in Graduate Hospital!
description:
Great 2 bedroom/2 bathroom rental in Graduate Hospital! This newer construction unit has a well-designed kitchen with stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and built-in microwave and is open to the living room for easy entertaining and convenience. The spacious living room is large enough to accommodate a seating area and dining set, or add some bar stools for dining at the ample counter space dividing the two rooms. In-unit laundry and central air conditioning add additional comfort and convenience. There are two large bedrooms, each with significant closet space. The larger bedroom has an en suite bathroom, walk-in closet and opens to a private balcony. The 2nd bedroom has a double-wide closet and easy use of the hallway bath. A roof deck shared with the other two units provides additional outdoor space and great views of the skyline. Close to local universities, hospitals and downtown businesses as well as great restaurants, fitness centers, coffee shops, public trans and I-76. With Lincoln Square less than 3 blocks away (Sprouts, Target, Wine & Spirits, etc.) everything you need is just a few steps away! Come see this great unit today.
